headline: A self-made millionaire says he doesn't believe in index funds — and explains why he doesn't see options as higher risk
summary: "Options are not risky. The way people use them is risky," says trader Jason Brown. The investor rebuilt his fortune after losing it all in the market.

raw.headline: A self-made millionaire says he doesn't believe in index funds — and explains why he doesn't see options as higher risk

headline: Straight Talk Launches Mission to Help Families Build Healthy Digital Habits with "The First Phone Pact"
summary: NEW YORK, July 30, 2025--As families prepare for the back-to-school season, Straight Talk Wireless, a leading prepaid brand covered by Verizon’s 5G network, is addressing one of parents' most pressing concerns: helping children develop healthy phone habits from the start. The wireless carrier today released "The First Phone Pact," a resource that goes beyond connectivity to provide families with practical tools for establishing digital boundaries together. headline: Do Wall Street Analysts Like Verizon Communications Stock?
summary: Verizon Communications has underperformed the broader market and industry peers over the past year, yet Wall Street analysts remain moderately optimistic about the stock’s growth potential.
